ViewObject.Name: GraphBudgetdExpVsActualExpVO
ViewObject.SQLQuery: --BUDGETED EXPENSES VS ACTUAL EXPENSES select CLD_ID CLD_ID, SLOC_ID SLOC_ID, ORG_ID ORG_ID, HO_ORG_ID HO_ORG_ID, PRD_DTL_START_DT PRD_DTL_START_DT, PRD_DTL_END_DT PRD_DTL_END_DT, PER_ID PER_ID, PERIOD_DESC PERIOD_DESC, BUDG_EXP_AMT_BS BUDG_EXP_AMT_BS, ACTUAL_EXP_AMT_BS ACTUAL_EXP_AMT_BS FROM ( select X.CLD_ID CLD_ID, X.SLOC_ID SLOC_ID, X.ORG_ID ORG_ID, X.HO_ORG_ID HO_ORG_ID, X.PRD_DTL_START_DT PRD_DTL_START_DT, X.PRD_DTL_END_DT PRD_DTL_END_DT, X.PER_ID PER_ID, X.PERIOD_DESC PERIOD_DESC, sum(NVL(X.EXP_AMT_BS,0)) BUDG_EXP_AMT_BS , SUM(NVL(Y.GL_AMT,0)) ACTUAL_EXP_AMT_BS from (select D.CLD_ID, D.SLOC_ID, D.ORG_ID, D.HO_ORG_ID, D.ORG_FY_ID, D.STRT_DT PRD_DTL_START_DT, D.END_DT PRD_DTL_END_DT, sum(V.ITM_AMT_BS) EXP_AMT_BS, D.PER_ID, D.PERIOD_DESC from bdg.bdg$fin$budget$prod$prd$dtl V, (SELECT B.CLD_ID, B.ORG_ID, F.ORG_CREATE_REF_SLOC_ID SLOC_ID, NVL(F.ORG_ID_PARENT_L0, F.ORG_ID) HO_ORG_ID, B.ORG_FY_ID, B.PER_ID, B.PERIOD_DESC, B.STRT_DT, B.END_DT FROM FIN.FIN$YEAR_FRQNCY_VW B, (SELECT CLD_ID, SLOC_ID, ORG_ID, DECODE(BDG_METHD,1,'D',2,'W',3,'Q',4,'H',5,'M') PERIOD_TYPE --1 FOR DAILY,2 FOR WEEKLY,3 QUARTERLY ,4 FOR HALFYEARLY, 5 MONTHLY FROM APP.ORG$BDG$PRF) C, APP.ORG F WHERE B.ORG_ID = C.ORG_ID AND B.CLD_ID = C.CLD_ID AND B.PERIOD_TYPE = C.PERIOD_TYPE AND B.ORG_ID = F.ORG_ID AND B.CLD_ID = F.ORG_CLD_ID ) D WHERE ((V.BUDGET_TYPE(+) = 3 and AMT_TYP(+) = 'Dr') OR V.BUDGET_TYPE(+) = 2) AND V.CLD_ID(+) = D.CLD_ID AND V.ORG_ID(+) = D.ORG_ID AND V.PRD_DTL_START_DT(+) = D.STRT_DT AND V.PRD_DTL_END_DT(+) = D.END_DT group by D.CLD_ID, D.SLOC_ID, D.ORG_ID, D.HO_ORG_ID, D.ORG_FY_ID, D.STRT_DT, D.END_DT, D.PER_ID, D.PERIOD_DESC ) X , (--ACTUAL EXPENSES SELECT C.CLD_ID ,C.ORG_FY_REF_SLOC_ID SLOC_ID ,C.ORG_ID , C.ORG_FY_ID, SUM(B.GL_AMT_BS) GL_AMT, TRUNC(B.GL_VOU_DT) GL_DT FROM fin.GL A, FIN.GL_LINES B, APP.ORG$FY C WHERE C.CLD_ID = :CldIdBind AND C.ORG_ID = :OrgIdBind and c.ORG_FY_REF_SLOC_ID = :SlocIdBind AND C.ORG_FY_ID = app.fn_get_fy_id(:CldIdBind, :OrgIdBind, sysdate) AND NVL(A.GL_ARCH_FLG,'!') = 'N' AND B.GL_TXN_TYP_MIG not in ('O','MO') AND A.GL_ORG_ID=C.ORG_ID AND TRIM(UPPER(B.GL_AMT_TYP)) = 'DR' AND B.GL_VOU_DT BETWEEN C.FY_STRT AND C.FY_END AND B.GL_SLOC_ID= A.GL_SLOC_ID AND B.GL_ORG_ID = A.GL_ORG_ID AND B.GL_VOU_ID = A.GL_VOU_ID AND B.GL_VOU_DT = A.GL_VOU_DT AND (B.GL_CLD_ID , B.GL_SLOC_ID, B.GL_HO_ORG_ID, B.GL_COA_ID) IN (SELECT DISTINCT CLD_ID, SLOC_ID , HO_ORG_ID , COA_ID FROM APP.APP$ITM$COA WHERE COA_FOR = 145) GROUP BY C.CLD_ID ,C.ORG_FY_REF_SLOC_ID ,C.ORG_ID , C.ORG_FY_ID, TRUNC(B.GL_VOU_DT) ) Y where X.CLD_ID = :CldIdBind AND X.SLOC_ID = :SlocIdBind AND X.ORG_ID = :OrgIdBind AND X.HO_ORG_ID = :HoOrgIdBind AND X.ORG_FY_ID = app.fn_get_fy_id( :CldIdBind , :OrgIdBind, sysdate) AND X.CLD_ID = Y.CLD_ID(+) AND X.SLOC_ID = Y.SLOC_ID(+) AND X.ORG_ID = Y.ORG_ID(+) AND Y.GL_DT(+) BETWEEN X.PRD_DTL_START_DT AND X.PRD_DTL_END_DT group by X.CLD_ID, X.SLOC_ID, X.ORG_ID, X.HO_ORG_ID, X.PRD_DTL_START_DT, X.PRD_DTL_END_DT, X.PER_ID, X.PERIOD_DESC order by X.PRD_DTL_START_DT, X.PRD_DTL_END_DT )
